result.execSummary:
The defendant Chad Marvin Mau was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.12(8)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Costs shall be collected by the Dept of Correction as a
condition of Extended Supervision and/or Probation.

Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcoholic beverages.
Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact with the Victim.
Defendant shall undergo an AODA assessment and follow through with all recommendations thereof.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad Marvin Mau

records.addlTxt: Client Event Log Summary from LifeSafer
From Judge Conway, Final Jury Instructions and Verdict Forms

2:45 PM. 
Defendant Chad Marvin Mau in court.  Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Chad Marvin Mau. 
Attorney Sauder Informs the court this matter is resolved and files plea questionnaire and waiver of rights with the court.
Defendant enters plea of "NO CONTEST" .
Court questions defendant re: his plea and waiver of rights.
Court questions attorney Sauder re: her clients plea and waiver of rights.
Defendant is advised of their voting rights.
Court finds plea and waiver is made freely, voluntarily, and intelligently.
Court accepts plea and finds the defendant "GUILTY". 

State moves for joint recommendation of the parties.
Attorney Sauder joins in the motion.

Court Orders: Sentence withheld probation for a period of 1 year
-No alcohol
-Aoda
-No contact with Victim
-Costs

Refund Cash Bond to Poster
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

02:04 PM
 Defendant Chad Marvin Mau in court. Prosecuting Atty Jenna L Gill appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Defendant Chad Marvin Mau.
Attorney Sauder moves for plea/sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

02:04 PM
 Defendant Chad Marvin Mau in court. Prosecuting Atty Jenna L Gill appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Defendant Chad Marvin Mau.
Attorney Sauder moves for plea/sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on June 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

01:30 PM
 Defendant Chad Marvin Mau in court with attorney Morgan Sauder. Prosecuting Atty Jenna L Gill appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Sauder moves to continue for further negotiations.  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Fax Confirmation Receipt - Signed Signature faxed to dispatch
Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcoholic beverages or nonprescription controlled substances, or any prescription medicine for which the defendant does not have a current prescription.
Scheduling conference on May 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:21 PM
 Defendant Chad Marvin Mau in court with attorney Morgan Sauder. Prosecuting Atty Jenna L Gill appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Sauder and  Defendant acknowledges criminal complaint and waive formal reading.
Court finds probable cause for filing.

Court Orders:
-$2,000.00 Signature Bond
-No Alcohol or Controlled Substances

"NOT GUILTY" entered.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
